DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: DRYAD.Copy numbers.Expression.ParasitismAssays
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: EXCEL FILE: Tab1) Symbiont copy numbers and natural log transformations from qPCR data. Values are corrected with EF-1 aphid reference gene. Adjusted to reflect whole-aphid values. Tab2) Toxin expression and reference gene data. Values are unadjusted qPCR copy numbers. Tab3) Parasitism assays for levels of aphid resistance.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: mutualism
host-parasite
insect-microbe
endosymbiont
microbial ecology
